mobilitydetection.hdm.kk104.com.mobilitydetectionlibrary.constants

Class MobilityDetectionConstants

  • java.lang.Object
    • mobilitydetection.hdm.kk104.com.mobilitydetectionlibrary.constants.MobilityDetectionConstants

  • public class MobilityDetectionConstants
extends Object
    Class containing the default values for: intervals for ActivityRecognitionClient, loitering delays and radii for Geofences

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static long FAST_INTERVAL
      Fastest update interval for ActivityRecognitionClient
      static long INTERVAL
      Default update interval for ActivityRecognitionClient
      static int LOITERING_DELAY_ACTIVITY
      Loitering delay for a geofence and when no new activities are recognized by the ActivityRecognitionClient.
      static int LOITERING_DELAY_POWER
      Loitering delay for a geofence when the power connection has been established.
      static int LOITERING_DELAY_STATIONARY_WIFI
      Loitering delay is used for deciding whether a wifi connection is a mobile hotspot or a stationary network.
      static int LOITERING_DELAY_WIFI
      Loitering delay for a geofence when a wifi connection has been established.
      static long MEDIUM_INTERVAL
      Medium update interval for ActivityRecognitionClient
      static long RADIUS_ACTIVITY
      Radius for a geofence when no new activities are recognized by the ActivityRecognitionClient.
      static long RADIUS_POWER
      Radius for a geofence when a power connection is established.
      static long RADIUS_WIFI
      Radius for a geofence when a wifi connection is established.
      static long SLOW_INTERVAL
      Slowest update interval for ActivityRecognitionClient

    • Field Detail

      • INTERVAL

        public static long INTERVAL
        Default update interval for ActivityRecognitionClient

      • FAST_INTERVAL

        public static long FAST_INTERVAL
        Fastest update interval for ActivityRecognitionClient

      • MEDIUM_INTERVAL

        public static long MEDIUM_INTERVAL
        Medium update interval for ActivityRecognitionClient

      • SLOW_INTERVAL

        public static long SLOW_INTERVAL
        Slowest update interval for ActivityRecognitionClient

      • LOITERING_DELAY_WIFI

        public static int LOITERING_DELAY_WIFI
        Loitering delay for a geofence when a wifi connection has been established.

      • LOITERING_DELAY_STATIONARY_WIFI

        public static int LOITERING_DELAY_STATIONARY_WIFI
        Loitering delay is used for deciding whether a wifi connection is a mobile hotspot or a stationary network.

      • LOITERING_DELAY_POWER

        public static int LOITERING_DELAY_POWER
        Loitering delay for a geofence when the power connection has been established. The value is used for deciding whether an user is charging its mobile device with a power bank or from an socket.

      • LOITERING_DELAY_ACTIVITY

        public static int LOITERING_DELAY_ACTIVITY
        Loitering delay for a geofence and when no new activities are recognized by the ActivityRecognitionClient. The value is used for changing the configuration of the ActivityRecognitionClient in order to prevent battery drainage.

      • RADIUS_POWER

        public static long RADIUS_POWER
        Radius for a geofence when a power connection is established. The value is used for deciding whether an user is charging its mobile device with a power bank or from an socket.

      • RADIUS_WIFI

        public static long RADIUS_WIFI
        Radius for a geofence when a wifi connection is established. The value is used for deciding whether a wifi connection is a mobile hotspot or a stationary network.

      • RADIUS_ACTIVITY

        public static long RADIUS_ACTIVITY
        Radius for a geofence when no new activities are recognized by the ActivityRecognitionClient. The value is used for changing the configuration of the ActivityRecognitionClient in order to prevent battery drainage.

        public MobilityDetectionConstants()
